byline.contributor: Chris Buckley contributed reporting from Beijing.

abstract: United Nations Committee Against Torture grills senior Chinese officials over country's record on torture and whether it has taken steps to promote human rights and rule of law.
lead_paragraph: The pointed questions came as experts with the United Nations challenged China’s commitment to ending torture and governing by the rule of law.

headline.main: China Faces Sharp Questioning by U.N. Panel on Torture
headline.print_headline: U.N. Panel Presses Chinese Officials About Torture and the Rule of Law

snippet: The pointed questions came as experts with the United Nations challenged China’s commitment to ending torture and governing by the rule of law.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
